categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Scopique was a male Zabrak Sith Acolyte, who trained at Darth Scabrous's Sith academy on Odacer-Faustin. He was also known to have owned a holocamera during his time at the academy.
Scopique was scheming, and willing to use anyone to his advantage.
Scopique was able to use the Force to disable Mannock T'sank, a much larger Acolyte at the Sith Academy where he trained.
